item.title: 先是通货膨胀，现在又是关税：低收入美国人无法喘息
item.description:
经过去年的喘息之后，商品价格又开始上涨。【原文：

After a respite last year, prices of goods are back on the rise.

】

item.title: 更多企业转向涨价，美国小型企业乐观情绪回落
item.description: 由于企业主对关税日益感到不安，2 月份美国小企业的乐观情绪降至四个月来的最低点，一项衡量不确定性的指标接近历史最高点。【原文：US small-business optimism fell to a four-month low in February and a gauge of uncertainty neared a record high as business owners grew uneasy about tariffs.】

item.title: 据说印度电动汽车制造商 Ather 正考虑以 12 亿美元的价值进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由英雄摩托有限公司（Hero MotoCorp Ltd.）支持的印度电动摩托车制造商 Ather Energy Pvt.可能会按计划在孟买进行首次公开募股，估值约为 12 亿美元。【原文：Ather Energy Pvt., an Indian electric-scooter maker backed by Hero MotoCorp Ltd., may pursue its planned initial public offering in Mumbai at about $1.2 billion valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟出售债务，市场在寻找国防债券范围的线索
item.description: 欧盟发行的新债券获得了超过 850 亿欧元的订单，这表明就在该地区寻求增加国防开支之际，人们对欧盟的债务有着强烈的需求。【原文：The European Union’s offering of a new bond pulled in more than €85 billion of orders, showing solid appetite for its debt just as the region looks to spend more on defense.】

item.title: 匈牙利中央银行行长调查前任的基金会
item.description: 匈牙利央行新领导层在行长米哈伊-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）的领导下，对其前任十多年前成立的有争议的基金会展开了调查。【原文：Hungary’s new central bank leadership under Governor Mihaly Varga has launched a probe into controversial foundations that his predecessor set up more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 大韩航空合并后更换徽标，升级菜单和贵宾室
item.description: 大韩航空（Korean Air）在收购当地竞争对手韩亚航空（Asiana Airlines Inc.【原文：Korean Air unveiled a new corporate logo and aircraft livery as part of a wide-ranging brand refresh following its acquisition of local rival Asiana Airlines Inc. that has created Asia’s second-biggest airline group.】

item.title: 北海遇险油轮侧壁出现大洞，闷烧不退
item.description: 英国广播公司（BBC）播出的画面显示，一艘美国油轮周一在北海被一艘集装箱船撞击，船舷被撞出一个大洞，正在冒烟。【原文：A US oil tanker that was struck by a container ship in the North Sea on Monday was smoldering with a gaping hole in its side, footage broadcast by BBC News showed.】

item.title: 比特币和以太币在宏观担忧推动下大幅下跌后反弹
item.description: 比特币从四个月低点回升，因为国债收益率下降鼓励一些交易者抢购受近期风险资产抛售影响的加密货币。【原文：Bitcoin recovered from a four-month low as falling Treasury yields encouraged some traders to snap up cryptocurrencies hit by the recent selloff in risk assets.】

item.title: 加拿大股市有望创 2022 年以来最长连胜纪录
item.description: 随着与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易争端日趋紧张，至少有一个领域加拿大还能坚持自己的立场，那就是股市。【原文：There’s at least one area where Canada is more than holding its own as the trade spat with US President Donald Trump grows increasingly tense — the stock market.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务将长江基建列为特别管理机构的可能买家
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司本周在伦敦法院提起上诉，如果该公司被推入特别管理程序，该公司正寻求将长江基建控股有限公司（CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. ）列为潜在买家。【原文：Thames Water is seeking to line up CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. as a potential buyer for the utility if it’s pushed into special administration following an appeal in a London court this week.】

item.title: 据说 Charterhouse 将收购法国 Estya 公司的大部分股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Charterhouse Capital Partners 将从 Chequers Capital 手中收购 Estya 的多数股权，该交易对这家专门从事电子消防安全和安保系统的法国服务提供商的估值超过 3 亿欧元（约合 3.27 亿美元）。【原文：Charterhouse Capital Partners is buying a majority stake in Estya from Chequers Capital in a deal valuing the French services provider specializing in electronic fire safety and security systems at more than €300 million ($327 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富达以 25 亿美元的价值支持芯片初创公司 Celestial AI
item.description: Celestial AI 是一家寻求利用光来加快服务器内部数据传输的初创公司，该公司已融资 2.5 亿美元，以便在降低人工智能计算能力要求的竞赛中占据有利位置。【原文：Celestial AI, a startup that seeks to use light to speed up data transfer inside servers, has raised $250 million to better position itself in a race to lower AI computing power requirements.】

item.title: 雷恩称国防开支不一定会减缓欧洲央行降息步伐
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）认为，增加国防开支并不一定会导致欧洲中央银行放慢降息步伐。【原文：A ramp-up in defense spending doesn’t have to lead to slower interest-rate reductions by the European Central Bank, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 俄罗斯货运报价打动担心原油短缺的印度买家
item.description: 印度国有炼油厂与俄罗斯原油销售商之间的谈判表明，印度有充足的供应量来满足近期需求，这缓解了人们对美国最近一波制裁后原油流动可能放缓数月的担忧。【原文：Talks between India’s state-owned refiners and traders selling Russian crude suggest ample supply is available to meet near-term demand, easing concerns that flows could slow for months after latest wave of US sanctions.】

item.title: 波兰称欧洲必须进一步向俄罗斯施压
item.description: 波兰财政部长安杰伊-多曼斯基（Andrzej Domanski）表示，欧盟在帮助乌克兰抵抗俄罗斯方面绝不能松懈。【原文：The European Union mustn’t let up in its efforts to help Ukraine resist Russia, according to Polish Finance Minister Andrzej Domanski.】

item.title: 工党支出计划推动英国基础设施企业发展
item.description: 科思坦集团公司（Costain Group Plc）和基尔集团公司（Kier Group Plc）发布了乐观的 2025 年展望，将受益于工党政府计划在 2029 年前交付 150 个大型基础设施项目，从道路到风力发电场。【原文：Costain Group Plc and Kier Group Plc issued upbeat 2025 outlooks, standing to benefit from the Labour government’s plans to deliver 150 major infrastructure projects by 2029 from roads to wind farms.】

item.title: 经济增长担忧挥之不去，欧洲股市连续第四天走低
item.description: 由于对美国经济衰退的担忧加剧了全球股市的下跌，欧洲股市连续第四个交易日下跌。德国 DAX 指数因围绕支出协议的乐观情绪而表现出色。【原文：European stocks retreated for a fourth straight session as worries about a faltering US economy fueled a global selloff. Germany’s DAX outperformed on optimism around a spending deal.】

item.title: 凯茜-伍德谈人工智能和大科技的下一步发展
item.description:
在彭博投资公司现场录制。【原文：

Recorded live at Bloomberg Invest.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：凯茜-伍德谈人工智能和大科技的下一步发展（播客）
item.description: 市场一直在抛售，今年迄今为止，英伟达等科技公司的股价下跌了近 20%。但是，即使在最近的大跌之前，DeepSeek 就已经震撼了人工智能市场，并引发了关于美国平台将如何竞争并真正实现技术货币化的问题。尽管存在这些障碍，一些投资者仍然对技术持乐观态度。ARK投资管理公司的创始人、首席执行官兼首席投资官凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）就是其中最著名的一位，她的创新基金（Innovation Fund）在人工智能领域投入了巨资。【原文：Markets have been selling off, with shares of tech companies like Nvidia down almost 20% so far this year. But even before the recent selloff, DeepSeek rattled the AI market and sparked questions over how US platforms will compete and actually monetize their technology. Despite all these hurdles, some investors remain tech optimists. Cathie Wood, the founder, CEO and chief investment officer of ARK Investment Management, is one of the most prominent, with ARK’s Innovation Fund heavily invested i】

item.title: 泰国提供税收优惠以刺激下滑的股市
item.description: 泰国将为投资该国股票市场的企业提供税收优惠，今年以来，由于外资外流，该国股票市场的表现逊于同行。【原文：Thailand will provide tax incentives for investments in the nation’s equity market that has underperformed peers this year amid foreign outflows.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀问题在央行挑战中恶化
item.description: 匈牙利的通胀率出人意料地连续第五个月加速上升，这加强了新任央行行长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）反对仓促放松货币政策的倾向。【原文：Hungary’s inflation unexpectedly continued to accelerate for a fifth month, reinforcing new central bank Governor Mihaly Varga’s bias against rushing monetary easing.】

item.title: 中国第三号领导人因病缺席重要政治会议
item.description: 据当局称，中国第三号官员、前反贪局局长因健康原因缺席了中国最高立法机构的闭幕式。【原文：China’s No. 3 official and former anti-corruption chief missed the closing ceremony of his country’s top legislative body for health reasons, according to authorities.】

item.title: 德意志交易所清流公司将提供比特币和以太币托管服务
item.description: 德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse）的交易后部门 Clearstream 表示，它将在今年晚些时候向机构客户提供加密货币结算和托管服务，这标志着欧洲主要金融机构对数字资产类别的最新推动。【原文：Deutsche Boerse’s post-trade unit Clearstream said it will offer cryptocurrency settlement and custody services to institutional clients later this year, marking the latest push into the digital asset class by a major European financial institution.】

item.title: 摩科瑞从道达尔交易部门聘用原油交易员
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩科瑞能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）已从法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）的贸易部门聘请了石油交易员Naoaki Matsuo和Thibault Drillon加入其不断扩大的能源团队。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. has hired oil traders Naoaki Matsuo and Thibault Drillon from the trading arm of French oil major TotalEnergies SE to join its expanding energy team, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国全卡车联盟准备走出国门的第一步
item.description: 在几年前被国内监管机构剪掉翅膀后，Full Truck Alliance Co. 公司正准备进军中亚，加入越来越多寻求海外新市场的中国科技公司的行列。【原文：Full Truck Alliance Co. is preparing to expand into Central Asia after getting its wings clipped by domestic regulators a few years ago, joining a growing number of Chinese tech companies seeking new markets abroad.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将在全球大跌后小幅反弹
对美国经济蔓延的担忧促使交易商在全球范围内寻找避险工具
item.description: 从抛弃美股转投中国股市，到买入日元和欧元，交易员们都在四处躲避，因为他们在思考美国市场的崩溃可能会给世界带来怎样的冲击。【原文：From ditching US stocks for Chinese peers to buying the yen and the euro, traders are running for cover as they ponder how a US markets meltdown may convulse the world.】

item.title: 中国股市将创下七年来最佳人大表现
item.description: 即使近期出现下滑，中国股市仍有望创下 2018 年以来全国两会期间的最佳表现。【原文：Even with the recent slide, Chinese shares are poised to post their best performance during a National People’s Congress since 2018.】

item.title: 宏观基金的期权交易越来越多地抛弃美元
item.description: 宏观对冲基金在应对美国经济忧虑引发的市场动荡时，越来越多地寻求将美元排除在外的货币期权交易。【原文：Macro hedge funds are increasingly seeking currency option trades that exclude the dollar as they navigate the market turbulence stemming from worries about the US economy.】

item.title: 韩国新外汇规则再次呼吁进行更多根本性改革
item.description: 分析人士说，韩国促进外汇流入的新措施只是在边际上做了一些调整，这将带来短期的稳定，同时也暴露出需要从根本上改变政策。【原文：South Korea’s new measures to boost foreign currency inflows are tinker-at-the-margins tweaks that will breed short-term stability while exposing the need for more fundamental policy changes, analysts say.】
